title: Dispute Credit Report Error
description: A customer has found an error on their credit report that originates from their account with the bank and wants it corrected.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the specific account information they are disputing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the customer's auto loan, which the customer claims was paid off but is still showing a balance on their credit report.

tasks.description: Investigate the bank's records for the account in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the account history and confirms that the loan was indeed paid in full six months ago.

tasks.description: Submit a request to the credit bureaus to correct the inaccurate information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent files a data correction request with all three major credit bureaus.
